title: Managing spatio-temporal heterogeneity of susceptibles by ...
summary: This blog post investigates managing spatio-temporal heterogeneity of susceptibles in epidemic modeling. It references survey data for Omicron variant attack rates and epidemiological survey data for confirmed cases, focusing on the time-interval from infection to contact.
